title: After Opponent's Hijab Falls Off, Football Players Huddle Around Her So Her Hair Isn't Seen
text:
After Opponent's Hijab Falls Off, Football Players Huddle Around Her So Her Hair Isn't Seen

After Opponent's Hijab Falls Off, Football Players Huddle Around Her So Her Hair Isn't Seen

Sports teaches you a lot of things, but one thing that only sports can teach is sportsmanship. That is a valuable lesson for life.

And that is what happened in this football game which was played in Jordan between Shabab al Ordon club and Arab Orthodox Club. The match was a part of the WAFF Women's Club Championship.

The video of the incident was shared on Twitter with the caption, ‘She was wearing a Hijab and the opponents huddled around to make sure that her hair's not seen. This is the most wholesome thing you will see today.

The video shows a player of Arab Orthodox Club trying to get past her defenders when her hijab falls. After this, women from the opposite team immediately come forward, huddle around her in order to protect her modesty.

Watch the video here:

She was wearing a Hijab and the opponents huddled around to make sure that her hair's not seen. This is the most wholesome thing you will see today 😌 pic.twitter.com/e3CTkN38ix — Turgut ⚉ (@ItsSlyGuy) October 15, 2019
